items.summary: Add the 5 user-uploaded images (im1-3.jpg, im2-3.jpg, im1-4.jpg, im2-4.jpg, im1-5.jpg) to the frontend static assets so they can be referenced by the Pride Moments carousel.

Update Pride Moments content to use the uploaded images in the carousel by replacing the existing Pride Moments event image sources with /assets/im1-3.jpg, /assets/im2-3.jpg, /assets/im1-4.jpg, /assets/im2-4.jpg, and /assets/im1-5.jpg (keeping meaningful English alt text for each image).
Ensure the Pride Moments carousel remains fully manual (no auto-advance) and users can navigate through all provided images using previous/next buttons and indicators.
